id.description: Unique Identifier for a user - User ID

client_type.description: The Client [type](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/207373866-Zoom-Installers) using which the user signed in.

date_time.description: The date and time at which the user signed in.

version.description: Version of the [Zoom Client](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/207373866-Zoom-Installers). If the user signed in using their browser, the value of this field will be "-".
